textBeforeTable: Defensive coordinators here. Below are the statistical resumes of every 2012 offensive coordinator with at least two years of OC experience, some of whom have already been fired, sorted by the average ranking in terms of total yards per game over their respective careers. A number of the below coaches have a sample size of just a few years, so be careful not to make too much of any extraordinarily high or low rankings: by Jimmy Kempski. Jan 4th, 2013 Offensive coordinator career statistical resumes Redskins 2013 draft picks Giants 2013 draft picks Eagles 2013 draft picks Cowboys 2013 draft picks NFC East 2013 draft picks Redskins 2012 Draft Picks Giants 2012 Draft Picks Eagles 2012 Draft Picks Cowboys 2012 Draft Picks NFC East 2012 draft picks About Blogging the Beast / Contact / Mailbag Skip to Content ↓ We be journalizin', son.
